audioText: Il tiendra naturellement sa promesse même si cela semble impossible à réaliser maintenant.
question: What will he naturally do despite the apparent difficulty?
options: Keep his promise even if it seems impossible
Cancel his plans due to the challenges
Ask for help from his family members
Delay the project until next year
explanation: The text states 'Il tiendra naturellement sa promesse même si cela semble impossible à réaliser maintenant' - He will naturally keep his promise even if it seems impossible to achieve now. 'Tiendra' is the future form of 'tenir' (to hold/keep), 'naturellement' means 'naturally', and 'impossible' describes the apparent difficulty.
